creator: reinhard.pointner@gmail.com
text:
Apache Ant comes with a fetch.xml build file that automatically downloads commonly used ant libs and dependencies.

It would be really nice if fetch.xml would fetch the Apache Ivy dependencies as well.

fetch.xml:
<!--
  =======================================================================
    Build file to fetch optional libraries for Apache Ant
  =======================================================================
-->

<!-- Fetch Apache Ivy here -->

creator: reinhard.pointner@gmail.com
text:
Thanks!

I guess `ivy` should also be added here as well, so that the ivy target is actually executed ant fetch.xml is called:
